data.message: Hi, i just received an information from a Marie Zimmerman that I won 600,000 from a lottery draw. Is this real? She even sent me a letter from FB office confirming that I won. And she said she works with facebook. She even said she works with Facebook. Pls help me check and tell me if this is real. If not pls do delete this persons facebook account. Thank you so much

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Roselle. It sounds like the email or notification you saw is likely a scam. To report this to us, please follow these steps listed in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1QxNVzg. For more information on suspicious emails or notifications, visit the following: http://on.fb.me/1QW2cjh. Thanks. -Azaria
Anybody there that can help with information with scammers getting a hold of you on messenger saying you won 500,000 grand. 12 winners in all

Facebook you can make this clear do Facebook offers lottery to people to know that you all don't do this at ALL could put a stop to this nonsense and stop scammers from taking advantage of poor innocent people
